definition: dial or meter for displaying speed, time, or other measurements/cyclocomputer/code table (computing)
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Intuition and experience are of far greater value in applying frequency tables.
sentences.chinese: 在寻找密码表时，直觉和经验更为重要。

sentences.english: We stopped the clock at $3200 per head.
sentences.chinese: 我们在人均收入3200美元时停止了这个码表。

sentences.english: Saves battery if required to run the stopwatch for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 救援电池如果需要跑码表有很长的一段时间。

sentences.english: A new construction method of dynamic encoding based on code table is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于码表的动态编码的理论与方法。
包含了加密的管理密码表。

sentences.english: He started timing them with a stopwatch, and they got faster.
sentences.chinese: 他开始用码表计时，于是他们变得快了一点。

definition: racing bicycle (abbr. for 公路自行車|公路自行车[gong1 lu4 zi4 xing2 che1])
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
